= Introduction =

- You will need MAVEN 2.x installed in your system.

- Go to the directory where you have installed jembedded and type “mvn clean install.”

- It will download the needed dependencies from various sites and generate and install  all the projects.

- If you want to generate the eclipse projects type: mvn eclipse:eclipse.

- In order to user the framework (core) you should declare the following dependency in your pom:

		{{{
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.jsemantic.jembedded</groupId>
			<artifactId>jembedded-core</artifactId>
			<version>0.1</version>
		</dependency>
                }}}
